item.description:
Vintage is one of Northern RIs favorite restaurants so come early to enjoy dinner and stay afterwards for an early night of dancing and fun to the classic rock sounds of FOUR ON THE FLOOR! Hope to see you there!

Four On The Floor(aka 4OTF) is a five-piece rock'n'roll group comprised of the five Brass Attack rhythm section members: Kevin, Dave, Jeff, Steve, and Tom. We play gigs once in a while in order to give the hardest working horn section in show business, the Brass Attack Horns, a well-deserved night off!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Deb's table-upstaires in lounge
item.name: Dinner & Four on the Floor
